title: Protect your neck
caption: Protect your neck
desc: Happy Halloween! We hope our vampire wasn’t too scary, on this day designed for spooky delights. The fortress in our image is Corvin Castle in Romania - not far from Transylvania. Bram Stoker’s novel Dracula helped cement the region in popular imagination as the home of the ghoulish count. Be careful out there tonight if you go trick or treating and keep reminding yourself: There’s no such thing as vampires…
